meanings.sent1: I enjoy golfing with my friends on weekends.
meanings.sent2: He took up golfing as a hobby last year.
meanings.sent3: After a long day at work, golfing is a relaxing way to unwind.
meanings.sent4: Her golfing skills are as precise as a surgeon's hands.
meanings.sent5: The sound of golfing in the distance was soothing.

meanings.definition: Engaging in the sport of golf.
meanings.sent1: We are golfing at the country club tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: She loves golfing on sunny days.
meanings.sent3: Golfing in the rain is not recommended!
meanings.sent4: His dedication to golfing is admirable.
meanings.sent5: The family spent the weekend golfing together.

meanings.definition: To participate in a game of golf.
meanings.sent1: They are golfing in the tournament next week.
meanings.sent2: I will be golfing with my colleagues after work.
meanings.sent3: Golfing at night under the stars sounds magical.
meanings.sent4: She decided to start golfing to stay active.
meanings.sent5: The friends planned on golfing at the new course.
